visual description: The Pier One Pullover features a color block design with shades of black, gray, and white. It incorporates a heathered pattern throughout, which gives it a textured appearance. The round collar is subtly outlined with a ribbed, solid black trim, offering a clean finish. Its cuffs and hem also have ribbed detailing for a snug fit, emphasizing the pullover's casual yet stylish look. There are no visible graphics or text on the garment. Overall, it presents a contemporary and versatile style suitable for various casual looks.
